page.title: 06Mobility in Portstewart
page.content: Of 189 families surveyed within the school,111 have always lived in the town and 78 have moved here from elsewhere-showing that just over 41% are relative newcomers to the town. Of those who have come to live in Portstewart a large majority(75%)came from other parts of Northern Ireland. Indeed over 80% came from other parts of our own county or from the neighbouring county of Antrim. 106 of the 189 families plan to go on holiday this year to a great variety of destinations-the most popular(1/3) being within Northern Ireland itself. Roughly 1/3 will head for other parts of the United Kingdom while the remaining 1/3 will head for Europe or even further afield.
